definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be wanton, reckless (NH id. (rare); Ar. faxaza be haughty, boastful, reckless; Targum [[פְּחַז]], Syr. ph.ez be lascivious, in der. spec. and deriv.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[אֲנׇשִׁים רֵיקִים וּפׂחֲזִים]] Ju Jdg 9:4; of prophets Zep 3:4 extravagant (‖[[אַנְשֵׁי בּׂגְדוֹת]]).
